tool.name: tool_0

param.name: INSIDE
param.dialogReference:
Force Inside

Boolean

Default: 0

If a centroid falls outside its polygon, then move it to the closest boundary.

tool.summary: Creates a points layer containing the centroids of the input polygon layer.

dataIdInfo.idCredit: Conrad, O., Bechtel, B., Bock, M., Dietrich, H., Fischer, E., Gerlitz, L., Wehberg, J., Wichmann, V., and Boehner, J.
